data.eml:eml: Revision of the genus-group Hystricella R. T. Lowe, 1855 from Porto Santo (Madeira Archipelago), with descriptions of new recent and fossil taxa (Gastropoda, Helicoidea, Geomitridae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mattia, Willy De, Neiber, Marco T., Groh, Klaus (2018): Revision of the genus-group Hystricella R. T. Lowe, 1855 from Porto Santo (Madeira Archipelago), with descriptions of new recent and fossil taxa (Gastropoda, Helicoidea, Geomitridae). ZooKeys 732: 1-125, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.732.21677, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.732.21677
